title: Main account stuck in transfer
body: I recently returned home (NA) from Italy. When I got home I transferred my main account back to NA....that was last week... I have been pretty patient with support but I submitted a ticket LAST WEEK! I check the account every few hours and it remains stuck. PLEASE HELP ME!!!! an entire week is kind of ridiculous considering we pay 2600RP for this transfer...

replies.body:
I looked over this account really quickly, and it looks like you should be able to login on NA with this account. Let me know if you're talking about a different account and I can double check that one too!

The agents in your ticket will be able to help, but they do need to work from a different e-mail from the one on your account for security purposes. If you'd like, you can also reach out to them using the new Live Chat feature as well!

Hi, i have the same problem on my main account, tried to transfer from eune to eu west and still stuck in the transfer.. 

Summoners name: EMILSEN

It looks like the transfer went through successfully and that account is on EUN now, but when it was transferred you needed to change the username. Double check that you're using the new one you created to sign in.

Hi, i tried to transfer from eune to eu west, i had an account on eu west that i created many years ago with the same username, but when i trasferred i didnt get the opportunity to change my username? So when i try to log in to eu west i just log in to a lvl 2 account.
Is there anything you could do? Im sitting at a lan and cant play on my only lvl 30account:( dont like playing without runes, masterys and champs:((

The account name was changed when it was transferred to EUW, which is why you're having a hard time getting logged into that account. If you still can't get it figured out, reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help once you're verified as the account creator.
The account name that is stuck is EDIT - summoner name Kog Maww
Thanks for the heads up! I've shimmied around and worked a little poro magic, and your account should be good to go now ^_^!
I don't know who you are, BROPORO, but I do know that you are my new hero! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Is there anyway to talk to someone other than submitting these tickets?? It takes them SO long to respond and when they do they tell me 1 thing like "i need another email address" then I have to wait another day or 2 to even get a response... please someone help.
